Article.ArticleTitle: Hypertension as a manifestation of COVID-19 pneumonia.

Abstract.AbstractText: Several factors such as hypertension, bile duct disease, and age can affect the duration of COVID, which can lead to long COVID. Any course of coronavirus infection could have a diverse nature of clinical forms and should have a personalized approach.
